title: Nature's Truth® Aromatherapy Energy 100% Pure Essential Oil 0.51 fl. oz. Box
description: 100% pure essential oil. Botanical blend. Uplifting. Stimulating. Energizing. Stimulate your mind with this blend of uplifting essential oils. Its earthy, citrusy aroma energizes your mind, body and spirit, making it the perfect pick me up. Add to your diffuser and electrify the atmosphere of any room. Quality assured. Non GMO. 100% pure plant based. Gluten free. Paraben free. 100% pure & natural. naturestrutharoma.com. Quality evaluated and packaged in the USA.
